entry.title: Mac libboost_thread or thread-mt?
entry.summary: Gavin Andresen, a software developer, made updates to the makefile for Mac OS X and the build instructions. He assumed that the dependencies would be from MacPorts and the -mt boost libraries would be used. Additionally, he made modifications to the makefile for both Unix and Mac OS X to enable auto-building of dependencies using gcc's -MMD option.
